entry.title: Ai Memory
entry.summary: Introduction to Memory Agent Architecture (From The Rise and Potential of Large Language Model Based Agents: A Survey): Perception: Information input. Brain-Decision Making: Autonomous decision-making and planning, executing more complex tasks. Brain-Memory & Knowledge: Memory capability, storing Agent’s knowledge and skills.
